name: Vestigios
description:
What would you do to protect your family's legacy? In a town where dark creatures are released, your decisions are the only ones who will make a difference. Take a leap into Vestigios and try to befriend its monsters, or fall into the abyss of death they're known for.  

Liwen Town is my mom's birthplace, and a place filled of stories ready to uncover. Since I remember, we came every year for the Halloween festivals and to visit grandpa. He was the greatest adventurer I've ever met.

A few months ago... He passed away.

That's why I don't want to miss the Halloween festival of this year. It's the annual tribute I wanna make for my grandpa.

But I wasn't prepared for what he was hiding in his house.

And everything started with that old box...

This game contains violence, mature themes, death, and the mention of blood, torture and use of tobacco. Characters and scenery are based on Latin American culture for entertainment purposes only and is not meant to replace true educational sources.

  • 10k words.
  • English and Spanish language.
  • Replayability .
  • Multiple endings.
  •  A secret true ending.
  • Beautiful art .
  • Incredible music and sfx. 
  • Monsters. 
  • A Latin American set-up.

 

Character Design and Props - Aura Rodriguez (Auroras)

Graphic Design and UI - Belén Edrira (Chise)

Narrative and Game Design - Giannina Tartaglia (Elithne)

Programming - Mariana Madeira (Namira)

Background Design - Marisabel Olivero (Leba)

Music and SFXs - Paula Quadrelli (Pau)

 Made with a lot of ♥️. We hope you enjoy the journey!
